attributes.action: be as young as you feel ! if you feel strongly about youth gangs - then why not keep them busier with more youth clubs ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M' Dad says that there has never been so much to do for teenagers (you know ... "in my day") ... but I think it is still a good idea for community clubs to be policed and supervised, opened regularly and the ratio of clubs : population examined. As a polciy, this might get some of the young on your side instead of them thinking that you're just going to sentence them or give them 25 lines in sentences !!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
